document.full_text: overcoming a fervent french crowd and a near sandstorm of claydust, roger federer proved he was ready to take on the ultimate challenge of trying to beat the seemingly invincible novak djokovic in the french open semi-finals.
document.title: federer breezes into djokovic semi-final
lines_and_colors: overcoming a fervent french crowd and a near sandstorm of claydust, roger federer proved he was ready to take on the ultimate challenge of trying to beat the seemingly invincible novak djokovic in the french open semi-finals.
